description:
After her form was exposed in town, causing an uproar, Bell and the others managed to rescue Weine. As they confront the difficulty of sheltering her aboveground, the Guild charges the Hestia Familia with a compulsory mission - to go to the dungeon`s Twentieth Floor and take Weine with them. Unable to figure out what the Guild is trying to do, and with no choice but to comply, Bell and the others head back down into the dungeon...
Source: crunchyroll
